function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Enduring transformation and permanent changes in cities due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restricting access to travel and questing for alternatives to public transit","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close relationship between urban development and new or re-emerging contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid means of transportation and expansion of urban sprawl contribute to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Connectivity between urban life and nature as a factor contributing to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Migration from rural to urban areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical precedence of urbanization and disease management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Issues related to urban dynamics from the perspective of urban and human geography, urban design, and planning, and transportation engineering.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socio-spatial implications and urban space/ urban life dialectics from the field of environmental psychology.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"New environments accommodating new living/working styles from ethnographical and anthropological perspectives.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for contagious disease spread in new living/working environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective practice management for disease containment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High degree of acceptability of intensive digital/virtual practices","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social and spatial implications of architects and planners examining the shift from physical to virtual","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"New living and working styles emerging post-pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variable interpretations of social distancing measures by governments and local authorities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Avoidance or resistance to individual social distancing practices","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Closure of public facilities and institutions as part of social distancing measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain effectiveness of social distancing for certain modes of disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent terminology social distancing vs. physical distancing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Acceptability of social distancing as a temporary measure","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of empirical research in the impact of pandemics on urban environments and architecture","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the social and psychological implications of emerging lifestyles in new spatial environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Acceptability of the new normal and social distancing measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of interdisciplinary collaboration may hinder effective pandemic response","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of social and behavioral factors may lead to ineffective policies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to advance vaccines and treatments due to lack of collaboration between medical and non-medical disciplines","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to implement a nationwide lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective adherence to social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Identification of unknown pneumonia cases in wuhan, china in december 2019","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Announcement of coronavirus outbreak as a public health emergency of international concern","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elevation of the uk’s public health risk level from ’very low’ to ’low’","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of defined roles in the health system for hospitals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of recognition for the relevance of social prescribing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic instability impacting public health and wellbeing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited health literacy and awareness","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate coordination of health care services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective local response strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective public health response and infrastructure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Authoritarian dimension of public health emergencies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of rapid
